# Test that basic functions work

# just var args
vim call HelloNil
cmp stdout test.golden

# no args
vim call Hello
cmp stdout test.golden

# single defined arg
vim call HelloWithArg '["World"]'
cmp stdout test.golden

# var args after positional args
vim call HelloWithVarArgs '["London", "Gophers"]'
cmp stdout gophers.golden

# call a function that calls another channel-defined function
vim call Func1
cmp stdout test.func2.golden

# call a bad function
vim -bang expr 'Bad()'
! stdout .+
stderr '^\Qfailed to expr(Bad()) in Vim: Caught ''got error whilst handling Bad: this is a bad function''\E'

-- test.golden --
"World"
-- test.func2.golden --
"World from Func2"
-- gophers.golden --
"London Gophers"
